title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: Contextual Learning Design Workshop Based on Knowledge Transfer Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Concepts and Fundamental Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain a framework for transforming and applying scientific knowledge across diverse contexts (daily life, societal, cultural).
Learners can propose solutions that integrate theoretical knowledge (know-that) and practical knowledge (know-how) for real-life problem-solving.
Learners can design knowledge adjustment strategies through three-stage (daily life → societal → cultural) contextual analysis and improve them based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
